title: American Nonprofit Provides Help To Ebola-Affected Areas
teaser: The Ebola outbreak in West Africa is the deadliest on record. One Colorado non-profit is among the groups racing to help.
contentencoded:
The Ebola outbreak in West Africa is the deadliest on record. One Colorado non-profit is among the groups racing to help.

Project C.U.R.E. is one of the largest providers in the world of donated medical supplies and equipment to developing nations.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Colorado Public Radio’s John Daley visited its warehouse as volunteers packed up the latest shipments bound for Africa.

  • CPR: Colo. non-profit shipping critical medical supplies to Ebola-stricken countries

Reporter

  • John Daley, health reporter at Colorado Public Radio. He tweets @CODaleyNews.
